name: ShagTree
overview:
ShagTree visually displays celebrity relationships and all the dating details with links to references.

This is a 2 person company ready for the next steps to blowing up. To date we have spent $0 in marketing but are getting decent organic traffic and incredible user visit time and # of clicks.

We have a huge database which can spin off into many different businesses and the main site is one mention away from going viral.

We are interested in any possibilities to expand the business and are not opposed to listening to offers.
